title: Giuliana Rancic's husband is silent partner in ripping E!
text:
David Becker Television personality Giuliana Rancic arrives at the Le Vian 2016 Red Carpet Revue at the Mandalay Bay Convention Center on May 31, 2015 in Las Vegas, Nevada. While Giuliana Rancic remains on the E! payroll, she has to be diplomatic about her time at the network. Her husband, Bill Rancic, on the other hand, has no such obligation.
When we asked the “Fashion Police” host if Kathy Griffin had thrown the show under the bus when she made her haughty exit last year, Giuliana said, “I can’t comment on that,” then motioned at her hubby, adding, “I can’t say it. He can.”
Bill gave the universally recognized look that says, “Hell, yes!”
Griffin ducked out of the show in March after only seven episodes, saying, “I do not want to use my comedy to contribute to a culture of unattainable perfectionism and intolerance towards difference.”
Giuliana told us at the Pink Agenda gala for the Breast Cancer Research Foundation and her own Fab-U-Wish charity that she has been focusing on her HSN line, G by Giuliana, since going part-time at E! in July.
When we suggested that her more frequent appearances on the TV shopping network might be a breath of fresh air after hosting E! News for 14 years, Bill again played the straight shooter. “From your mouth to God’s ear!” he said at the event held at Sixty Three°.
Giuliana laughed and said, “Stop saying that! You’re so bad! Bottom line: It’s just really nice to be doing what I’m very passionate about.”
Jeanette Settembre/New York Daily News Jeanette Settembre and Bradley Cooper on Sunday, October 18, 2015. COOPER IS AN AMERICAN SNAPPER
Celebrity selfie specialist Bradley Cooper has added another photo to his portfolio.
After a screening for his new movie “Burnt,” the sexiest man alive surprised Daily News reporter Jeanette Settembre when she asked if she could snap a selfie with him.
“Let me take it,” he insisted, reaching for the phone and firing off a trio of quick snaps, including the one seen here.
It’s not the first time the 40-year-old actor played shutterbug. He took the selfie seen ’round the world with Ellen DeGeneres last year at the Oscars.
Bryan Steffy Actor Liev Schreiber attends the SHOWTIME And HBO VIP Pre-Fight Party for "Mayweather VS Pacquiao" at MGM Grand Hotel & Casino on May 2, 2015 in Las Vegas, Nevada. Makayla Yarbrough WCP/4CRNS/Galo/FAMEFLYNET/WCP/4CRNS/Galo/FAMEFLYNET Singer Madonna and her dance crew spotted out for a bike ride in Santa Monica, California on October 18, 2015. Madonna had a little fun with the photographers by sticking her tongue out as she drove by. Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Michael Kors Actress Kate Hudson attends God's Love We Deliver, Golden Heart Awards at Spring Studio on October 15, 2015 in New York City. Previous Next Enlarge SCHREIBER IS IN TRAINING
Liev Schreiber and Naomi Watts dined with retired heavyweight boxer Chuck Wepner at Tribeca’s American Cut steakhouse on Saturday night. Schreiber plays Wepner in his upcoming film “Bleeding” and Watts, Schreiber’s partner of 10 years, will play the former fighter’s wife. We’re told that the trio dined on yellowfish tuna and Dover sole before going to Madison Square Garden to watch a boxing match. Wepner — the so-called Bayonne Bleeder — inspired Sylvester Stallone’s “Rocky” saga by knocking down Muhammad Ali in a 1975 fight that Ali ultimately won.
JENNIFER’S AGE-APPROPRIATE
Jennifer Connelly graces the cover of the latest issue of More magazine, where the 44-year-old star weighs in on the delicate subject of women aging in Hollywood. “We equate beauty for women with youth, and that’s sad,” she tells the mag. “It’s a shame it’s so hard for so many of us to appreciate the beauty of an older woman and to accept it in ourselves. I don’t want to erase my history on my face.”
Stuart C. Wilson/Getty Images Nicole Kidman is to die for at the Women of the Year Awards at the InterContinental hotel in London. JB Lacroix/WireImage Actress Lindsay Price looks bubbly at the Veuve Clicquot Polo Classic at Pacific Palisades in California. Previous Next Enlarge VILE THREATS FOR DISSING DISICK
Makayla Yarbrough tells friends she’s getting death threats after detailing her month of partying with reality star Scott Disick , who checked into rehab last week. Sources close to the 21-year-old stunner with the Elite Models agency tell us she regrets that her nonchalant observations of Disick’s Beverly Hills party pad — which she compared to a “brothel” — are being interpreted as judgmental by rabid Disick fans. According to our insider, “She doesn’t hate (Disick). She just thinks he’s living his life.”
MADGE SHOWS REBEL TONGUE
Madonna sticks her tongue out at photographers as she bikes through Santa Monica, Calif., with her dance team in tow. The 57-year-old “Girl Gone Wild” singer — who was getting some exercise before her Monday night show in San Jose — is in the middle of her “Rebel Heart” tour, which some critics have called her best in years. She certainly seems to be having fun.
A HEMSWORTH HOT-OFF
The two most perfect specimens on planet Earth also just happen to be brothers. Flashing their magical smiles at the premiere of “The Dressmaker” in Melbourne, Australia, we couldn’t decide who was the better looking bro, Liam or Chris Hemsworth , so we’ll just call it even. Tens across the board — for being handsome.
Splash News/Splash News At the premiere of "The Dressmaker" held at Crown Casino in Melbourne, Liam Hemsworth was joined by his brother Chris Hemsworth. JUST CALL THEM NEYONCÉ
Both Beyoncé and Nicki Minaj were spotted leaving the same dance studio in Brooklyn after a (now not-so-secret) rehearsal together. The divas rented out the space for five hours, working on a collaboration, and were spotted leaving around 9:30 p.m.
CHILLY RECEPTION FOR TRUMP
A crowd of 1,500 applauded when keynote speaker Barbara Corcoran , at a luncheon of the Women’s Fund of Greater Omaha, told them not to vote for Donald Trump . Bruce Littlefield , who is working on a book, “How to Find the Good People for Your Business and Your Life,” with Corcoran, said the crowd also applauded when she told them she once sued Trump for her commission on a real estate deal in New York City.
HUDSON HAS A POTTY POSSE
It isn’t uncommon for women to go to the bathroom in groups, but “Almost Famous” star Kate Hudson took things to a new level at the Gods Love We Deliver benefit in Tribeca. “When Kate Hudson wanted to go to the bathroom, it took two bodyguards,” said one onlooker, who watched Hudson’s hired muscle wait by the ladies’ room door until the 36-year-old Hudson had finished flushing. “In all fairness, three photographers followed her there, too,” said our spy.
